topic.title: Configuring a Different Authoring Experience Depending on the User Role

body.p: When the XML editor is opened, an userRole Loading Option is passed with the following values:

ul.li: REVIEWER - for reviewers of a review task
AUTHOR - for authors editing in the personal workspace

body.p: You can create multiple frameworks tuned for different user profiles and load them depending on the current user. You can share configurations between these frameworks by using the framework extension mechanism.

To configure a framework to be loaded for a particular user profile:
Install this plugin: . It will contribute some framework matching rules that takes the profile of the user into account.
Configure each of the Association rules for your framework to use the Java class that corresponds to the desired profile: AuthorUserFrameworkMatcher, ReviewerUserFrameworkMatcher, or OwnerUserFrameworkMatcher
